CustomField.description: If Account name contains the words "Honeywell Default" then populate with a 1 for true, otherwise populate with 0 for false
CustomField.formula: VALUE(if(CONTAINS( Account_Name__c,"HONEYWELL DEFAULT ACCOUNT"),"1",if(CONTAINS( Account_Name__c,"HONEYWELL UNIDENTIFIED"),"1",if(CONTAINS( Account_Name__c,"NO ACCOUNT FOUND"),"1",if(CONTAINS( Account_Name__c,"UNKNOWN"),"1","0")))))
CustomField.label: Default Account
